findings.title: Token Decimal cases not considered
findings.description: The CoderCrowdsale.sol contract does not consider token decimal cases when calculating token amounts to distribute, leading to offering 10^(-18) less tokens.

findings.title: FinishCrowdsale() is exploitable by owner to mint more tokens than specified by the whitepaper
findings.description: The finishCrowdsale() function allows the owner to mint more tokens than specified by the whitepaper, violating the intended behavior.

findings.title: Consider using ` memory  `
findings.description: `storage` can be replaced with `memory` if the values are not modified during use, which can help save some gas.
